item.title: statikit :: add comments to any static site in 5 minutes
item.description: Start a conversation on your static site Add comments and upvotes in minutes; works with any static site generator Start a conversation on your static site Add comments and upvotes in minutes; works with any static site generator Statikit is a hosted platform to add discussions quickly to any static site. fully hosted guest posting comment replies private email notifications threads admin UI Barbara Middleton Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
